thread.title: BRIEF-Protruly Technology plans to raise up to 2 bln yuan in private placement of shares
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Protruly Technology plans to raise up to 2 bln yuan in private placement of shares | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Protruly Technology plans to raise up to 2 bln yuan in private placement of shares
text:
Sept 24 Jiangsu Protruly Technology Group Co Ltd
* Says plans to raise up to 1.99 billion yuan ($311.82 million) in private placement of shares to fund projects
* Says shares to resume trading on September 25
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1iNFyQW ; bit.ly/1NOesUX
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3818 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
